group_1.textLeft: I just brewed some tea. Would you like a cup?

group_1.textRight: I would be grateful to accept.

group_1.textLeft: Here, there's miso soup for breakfast.@There's also an omelet and some boiled greens.

group_1.textRight: Ooh, this morning's miso soup is a feast of@wild vegetables.

group_1.textLeft: Your Grandma picked them this morning while@out for a walk in the mountains.

group_1.textRight: That means the weather is getting warmer, right?

group_1.narration: "The Yukuni City All-Stars Festival@is set to kick off soon!"
"Featured at the direct sales shop,@you'll be able to find local specialties in addition to@numerous exhibits highlighting the history and@traditions of Yukuni City."
"Moreover, the local street art prodigy "Urara Yume"@will be performing on stage in a unit!"
"Join us for an event jam-packed with exciting content!@For more information, please check out the@Yukuni City Tourism Association's website!"

group_1.textRight: It's almost time for the Festival to officially begin.
They're truly going all out for this event, even@revamping their approach to commercials.

group_1.textLeft: The avalanche and landslide this winter have@cast a shadow over the town's atmosphere.
Everyone is rallying to use this as an@opportunity to pull ourselves together.
We're planning to sell everything from wild@vegetables to meat.
Don't forget, we even vacuum-sealed the@smoked meat, right?
We're expecting a bunch of tourists from outside@the prefecture this year, so it should be fun.

group_1.textRight: ...I don't want to speak too bluntly, but I know some@who lost family members in the avalanche...
Still, I hope this opportunity can offer them some comfort, even if just a little.

group_1.textLeft: Here, I'll whip up some eggs.@Let's enjoy them together.
